mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1994 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the 1994 Barter Theatre Season. Productions include: Deja Vu by Bricaire & Lasaygues. Directed by Richard Rose | Three to Get Ready by David DeBoy. Directed by Cliff Goodwin | Man of La Mancha by Dale Wasserman. Directed by John Hardy | Oleanna by David Mamet. Directed by Don Stephenson.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
